param.name: startTime
param.help: Start date and time of the simulation (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS[.SSS])

param.name: numberOfStackedImages
param.help: Number of stacked images to produce. Simulation duration is numberOfStackedImages*exposuresPerStack*exposureTime.

param.name: maxImagesPerCube
param.help: Maximum number of images per image cube

param.name: doFullFrame
param.help: Set to true to output a fits file containing a full frame image corresponding to the first exposure of the simulation

param.name: updateDatabase
param.help: Set to true to update the CHEOPSim job submission database

param.name: databaseServer
param.help: Name of server for CHEOPSim job submission database

param.name: modulesToRun
param.help: Comma separated list of modules to be run

param.name: writeIncidentLightCurve
param.help: Set to true to output a fits file containing the intrinsic flux time series of the target star

param.name: imageDirectory
param.help: Full path of directory containing stacked images (optional)

param.name: extractLightCurve
param.help: Set to true to output a fits file containing the extracted light curve

param.name: generateNoiseCurve
param.help: Set to true to output a fits table containing the standard deviation of the light curve as a function of the binning in time

param.name: truthBarycentre
param.help: Set to true to use the truth barycentre rather than calculating the barycentre through photometry on the final image

param.name: radius_barycentre
param.help: Radius of circle centred on image centre used to determine PSF barycentre

param.name: radius_bkgInner
param.help: Inner radius of annulus centred on PSF barycentre used to evaluate the background

param.name: radius_bkgOuter
param.help: Outer radius of annulus centred on PSF barycentre used to evaluate the background

param.name: radius_psf
param.help: Radius of circle centred on PSF barycentre used to extract the signal flux

param.name: subtractBackground
param.help: Set to true to perform background subtraction during light curve extraction
